name: Bean game (alpha)
description:
this is a game where you play as a bean/capsule, and you have a grapple gun. And you are in a tiny box... yeah, that's it. This game is in the alpha version and is not even close to being done so there will be a lot of bugs. And BEAN game will not be its official name. And I do not plan on having the player stay a bean forever I want them to be at least a humanoid. 

CONTROLS

w, a, s, d, LEFT ctrl for crouch, and space for jumping duh...

I also don't want to fix the walking problem right now. so just shoot the gun at the ground if it happens
